summary: Craft lockpicks from embalming tools found around skyrim at the forge.
descriptionHtml:
[center][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=6][B]Craftable Lockpicks[/B][/SIZE][/FONT][/center]
[line]
[COLOR=#FFFF00][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][u]Description:[/u][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
This mod allows you to create your own lockpicks from embalming tools you find around Skyrim. The shape is already very similar to that of a lockpick, so I figure it wouldn't be too difficult for anyone to craft them into usable lockpicks.

The recipe is simple, one embalming tool (specifically the brain pick) can be made into one lockpick. If you have 10 or more in your inventory, you can craft 10 at a time. The recipe for lockpicks will only show (in the Misc category) if you have at least one embalming tool in your inventory.

Works seamlessly with my [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48465/?]Gem Dust Crafting and Alchemy[/URL] mod.

[COLOR=#FFFF00][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][u]How to use:[/u][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
Have at least one embalming tool in your inventory, go to the forge, the recipe will be under "Misc"

[COLOR=#FFFF00][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][u]Compatibility:[/u][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
Should work with everything as this only edits the Embalming Tool.

[COLOR=#FFFF00][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][u]Installation[/u][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
Download and activate with NMM. If required, remove with NMM.
Or activate/deactivate the .esp manually

[COLOR=#FFFF00][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][u]Change Log[/u][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
Version 1.0 - Craftable Lockpicks
author: Esmerelde
